name: tido.today (Notion task manager)
description: tido.today is part of the early.tools ecosystem – the home to discover and learn from pre-launch startups. ✧Drive your macro momentum. Week by week.Purpose requires discipline. Results require consistency. We make big bets every single day, but fail to translate them into wins. Tasks shouldn’t be a burden. They should help us carry a higher cause whilst having fun in the process. Knowing why you do is equally as important as knowing where you want to be.How does it work?Intentions and desired ou
features: TASK →What you want to get done.; INTENTION →Why you are doing it. (Past/Current Self); DESIRED OUTCOME →Where you want to be as a result. (Future Self); Landing page:https://tido.today/; Initial Webflow prototype for testing:https://ageofus.webflow.io/tido; Julian Paul's Twitter:https://x.com/itsjulianpaul
